title: Adults React To Ariana Grande - thank u, next (Full Album Reaction)

json.text:
- Can't help it.
Ooh, I feel that in the chest

- It has a really bad message,
but at the same time,

she's Ariana Grande.
Whatever.
♪ (industrial intro) ♪

- Ooh, I'm excited.
What we doing? What we doing?

- (FBE) So today, we are going
to be playing you selections

of every song from Ariana Grande's
new album, "thank u"--

- Yes! Yes!
I'm all for it.

- Great, 'cause I've been
putting this off for the last

couple of days,
so this is perfect.

- I haven't heard any of her music,
but I've found her to become

a little annoying.
- I'm a grownup,

so I just hear it on the radio.
But I feel like I hear, you know,

first of all, "thank u, next"
every five seconds.

- ♪ Staying up all night ♪
♪ Order me pad thai ♪

♪ Then we gon we sleep
till noon ♪

- (giggles) I love that part.
- ♪ You in the bathtub ♪

♪ Bubbles and bubbly, ooh ♪
- Aww, cute.

- ♪ This is a pleasure ♪
♪ Feel like we never ♪

♪ Act this regular ♪
- All I'm thinking right now is

"This is very Ariana"
as far as I'm aware.

- I'm just gonna be dancing
and jamming the whole time.

Just gonna be like, "Oh, yeah."
- ♪ Kiss me and take off

your clothes ♪
♪ Imagine a world like that ♪

- Oh my god!
(sings along) ♪ Imagine

a world like that ♪
- Even though you're not seeing

a full scale of it,
I've always been impressed

by Ariana Grande's range.
- ♪ ...sleep on your chest ♪

- So, she knows romance, right?
She got it.

Who is this song for, though,
is the question.

- ♪ Can you imagine a world... ♪
- It's such a peaceful song, too.

It's not, like-- this part!
- ♪ Imagine a world... ♪

Ah, so good!
- It's SO generic

of there's a person I like,
we should cuddle.

But also, I'm melting.
- I feel like it's just remembrance.

But at the time--
it's one of those things

where you really, really
love someone,

but you have got to let them go
or they gonna take you out.

When she's making reference
to those good times,

that's for real.
That's real talk.

- It's so personal to her.
So, you immediately, off the bat,

on the first song, you go,
"Okay, so that's the kind

of album this is gonna be."
And "This is gonna be great."

- (FBE) So, this second track
is called "needy,"

in which Ariana sings
that it's okay to feel needed,

to want attention, and to care,
and display emotions for others.

- Does this have anything
to do with Pete Davidson
and his tweet?

- ♪ And I’ma scream and shout
for what I love ♪

- That's pretty good.
I like that.

- ♪ ...don't give no [bleep] ♪
- Ooh. Give no [bleep].

- ♪ I'm a little messed up ♪
♪ But I can hide it

when I'm all dressed up ♪
- Just can't help it .

Ooh, I feel that in the chest.
- She speaks the truth a lot.

I think she's
a great lyricist, honestly.

- ♪ How you even think
it got this far? ♪

- Ooh.
- ♪ This far ♪

♪ And I can be needy ♪
- It's okay, girl. Me too. Me too.

- I love that she says that,
because I feel like people are like,

"Being needy is something bad."
- ♪ Tell me how good it feels

to be needed ♪
- I think the interesting thing

about her new music
is you can physically track

how it compares to things
that are actually happening

in her life, so it really is
just kind of a journal of sorts.

- I think it's sending
the wrong message to girls,

'cause, you know, I don't think
it's cute to be needy.

- My daughter listens
to her all the time.

There's a lot of permission
to be yourself in her music

and not living up to other people's
standards or expectations.

- ♪ Usually... ♪
- It's so good. Ah.

- ♪ But gravity seems to be
the only thing that's pulling me ♪

- This is such a pretty song.
- ♪ ...rise and shine

soon as them stars align ♪
- This one's just funny. (giggles)

It's cute, but it's just like,
how many space references

can they put in this?
- Yup.

- ♪ ...time apart
is beneficial ♪

- Oh, yeah.
- ♪ It's like I'm the universe

and you'll be ♪
- ♪ N-A-S-A ♪

♪ Give you the whole world ♪
- (chuckles)

- ♪ I'ma need space ♪
- Yeah. Right?

That longing, being away
from something for a minute

just to get some space.
- ♪ I'ma need space ♪

♪ I'ma, I'ma need space ♪
- I feel like if you're

in a teen movie,
and you're stargazing

on the roof of your car
with your girlfriend,

this is the song
that's playing.

- This album is confusing,
because the last song was "needy,"

and now she's like,
"No! I need SPACE!"

What's next? (laughs)
Oh, I bet the next song

is called "therapy."
- ♪ Love me, thank you, leave me ♪

- Ooh, a little funkier.
Look at her bring that in.

Good for her.
- This one sounds really different

from the other songs
I've heard already,

so I like that.
- ♪ Don't want you

in my bloodline ♪
- This feels more like

a spring break song.
- ♪ ...wanna have a good time ♪

- Ah! "Just wanna have
a good time." Called it.

- ♪ ...wanna have a good time, yeah ♪
- (laughs)

Ahh. I don't wanna
have offspring with you.

I just wanna experience your body.
That's really what it is.

- Ooh. ♪ Bom, bom, bom,
bom, bom, bom, bom ♪

- ♪ ...no need to apologize, no ♪
♪ But you gon' have to let

this [bleep] go, yeah ♪
- I love it!

YES!
- She tellin' somebody

that got way too [bleep] attached
after, you know, just a quick fling

and I think that's
funny as [bleep].

- ♪ I can't fake like I'm all right ♪
- Mm-mm. Can't do it.

"Can't fake like I'm all right."
- Poor baby.

She has had a hard year.
All the spotlight,

losing someone she loves,
someone she cares about.

- ♪ Fuck a fake smile ♪
- Fake smile.

- ♪ Fake smile ♪
- Okay. See, I like the song

because it's so personal.
- ♪ Hear what they're sayin'

on the TV ♪
♪ It's crazy ♪

- She's so good!
- The lyrics themselves

that make this album so unique,
because it's all based off

of her past experiences
that we've all kind of

watched her experience
in the spotlight.

- The space isn't
good enough for her.

Sleeping around isn't
good enough for her.

And now she's like, "Guys,
don't trust my smile.

I'm actually not happy."
What?!

I'm so confused right now.
- ♪ Got a bad idea ♪

♪ How 'bout we take... ♪
- (chuckles)

- ♪ ...a little bit
of time away? ♪

- Oh, yeah.
This one I've heard. (chuckles)

- This is something that you
definitely do after a breakup, though,

or just any sort of bad experience.
It's "Let me just forget

this ever happened"
or at least try to.

- ♪ Yeah, I'ma call you
over here

to numb the pain ♪
- I hate to admit it,

but it sounds like
all of her other songs.

- ♪ Bad idea ♪
- I like it. That felt more anthemic.

- I have a feeling I'ma like
every single song on this album.

- ♪ Love me when we make up ♪
- Little bit of reggae in there.

You feel it? You see?
- ♪ Promise me that when you

kiss my lips,
you'll make it stick ♪

♪ That's the way to shut me up
after an argument ♪

- Interesting.
- Uh-huh.

So, it's a little covering up.
You know, you make up,

but it's still
under the surface, you know?

- ♪ Yeah-eh-eh ♪
- Ooh.

- ♪ ...ruin my makeup ♪
- It sounds really similar

to just other things
that I've heard from her.

- It's very slow, though.
I love you, Ari,

but I don't think
I'm a fan of this one.

- The makeup on your face
and making up in terms

of a relationship.
They went well together

in terms of the track.
- She has such great beats

no matter what.
No wonder this album's everywhere,

everything at all times.
- (FBE) Fans speculate

that this next song, "ghosting,"
is dedicated and about Ariana's exes,

the late Mac Miller
and most recent ex Pete Davidson.

And fans think that this song
serves as an apology of sort

to Pete for having to see Ariana
in a negative state when she was

mourning the loss
of her ex love.

- Ugh, I hear this is the one
that makes people sad and crying.

And I haven't listened to it yet,
because I've been afraid.
- ♪ I wish he were here instead ♪
♪ The one that living in your head ♪

♪ He just comes to visit... ♪
- But "ghostin" for Mac Miller,

that kind of hurts me a little bit.
I'm kinda sad now.

- ♪ Baby, you do it so well ♪
♪ You've been so understanding ♪

- When you break up with somebody,
it's 'cause you're not happy.

But that doesn't mean
it was all bad.

- ♪ Admit that it
hurts you, baby ♪

- These songs get me the most,
any time someone sings

about a dead relative
or a dead lover, anything like that.

- I like the symphony
bedtime vibes.

- It's very heartfelt, right?
You can hear it in her voice.

- ♪ 'Stead of ghosting him ♪
- I'm so sad.

I miss Mac Miller.
I'm gonna cry.

I'm legitimately
tearing up a little bit.

- Ooh!
She better tell it.

Can't remember the last time
I felt this way about an album.

- I hate that I'm so invested
in Ariana Grande's relationships,

because none of this has
anything to do with me!

And yet, here I am feeling
upset over this song. (chuckles)

- ♪ My imagination's too creative ♪
- Yes, it is, bb.

- ♪ ...I see angel ♪
- I love this.
- ♪ Angel, angel ♪

♪ Without a halo... ♪
- I think this is probably

kind of what she did with Pete then,
where it was a relationship

that she jumped into really fast
and kind of just had this image

of, "I'ma marry him."
- That's what that first blush

of romantic love is.
It's also idealized.

And then you hold that
idealized version.

- ♪ But it was all in my head ♪
- See, at that point,

that's always your own fault.
You're creating an image in your head.
- ♪ It was all in my head ♪

- That voice. She can sing
the phone book

and it would sound great.
- All those songs we just heard,

there's not one on there
that I'm like, "I don't understand

what she's talking about."
They're all so heartfelt.

This feels like it came out
of all the stuff

that we all got
to see her go through.

- ♪ Been through some bad [bleep] ♪
- Ooh.

(sings along) ♪ Should
be a sad bitch ♪

- ♪ Who woulda
thought it'd... ♪

- (sings along) ♪ Turn me
to a savage ♪

Ooh.
- ♪ Rather be tied up

with calls and not strings ♪
♪ Write my own checks
like I write what I sing ♪

(raps) ♪ My wrist, stop watchin' ♪
♪ My neck... ♪

- I'm such a sucker
for "The Sound of Music" by the way.

- (raps along) ♪ Like my hair ♪
♪ Gee, thanks ♪

♪ Just bought it ♪
- ♪ I see it, I like it ♪

♪ I want it, I got it ♪
♪ I want it, I got it ♪

- This is a dumb song.
I like it, but it's a dumb song.

- Makes you feel powerful.
I hate it, because I wanna

listen to new stuff,
but I just fall back to this song.

- I prefer her singing, 'cause she has
an amazing singing voice.

If she's gonna release music,
I would like to hear her singing
and not "rapping."

- ♪ One taught me love ♪
- Ah. This was such a good song.

♪ (hums along) ♪
(sings along) ♪ Amazin' ♪

- ♪ Loved and I've lost ♪
♪ That's not what I see ♪

- I just want her
to sing me lullabies!

- ♪ Look what you taught me ♪
♪ And for that I say ♪

♪ Thank you, next ♪
- Oh! This is "thank u, next."

See? I haven't heard the song!
- Beautiful.

Such a good song.
This is a song that I'm like...

everybody should listen to.
- I can't remember those other songs.

The one about her needing space,
the one about being needy,

those are emotions that you might
feel from time to time,

but "thank u, next"
is this sort of long-term emotion

that she's gonna feel
for a huge part of her life.

- (FBE) Lastly is "break up
with your girlfriend, i'm bored,"

where Grande tries to get
a boy she's attracted to

to break up with his girlfriend
so she can have him herself.

- Yes! I am ready!
- ♪ You know what you're doing to me ♪

♪ You're singing my songs... ♪
- I think this is definitely

one of my favorites
off of the whole album.

- ♪ When I know you out here... ♪
- (sucks in breath) Mm.

- ♪ Then you realize she's... ♪
- Yo, every song in this album,

it's something that we all experience,
but people don't talk about a lot.

- (sings along) ♪ Break up
with your girlfriend ♪

♪ 'Cause I'm bored ♪
(giggles)

- (laughs)
- That's-- (laughs)

For some reason,
this cracks me up a little bit.

- I mean, it has
a really bad message,

but at the same time,
she's Ariana Grande. Whatever.

- She went through so much
before "thank u, next."

And then this entire album is kind of
like an emotional renaissance for her.

- I'm really impressed.
Love the album.

[Bleep], man.
What an artist, you know?

We're seeing it happen,
and it's really cool.

- Thanks for watching
this episode of Adults React.

And shoutout to Destiny Fox.
- Make sure you subscribe

and hit the bell,
so you never miss an episode.

And shoutout to Madison Adams.
- What's your favorite track

off the album?
Let us know in the comments below.

- Thank you! Next.
- Hi, guys. JC here,

producer here at FBE.
Make sure to subscribe

to this channel and also subscribe
to the React Channel to see more

of the reactors gaming, competing,
and so much more.

All the links are down
in the description. Bye!
